item.title: Tools hope to have for JsonSchema
item.description: When I was preparing a slides to recommend broad usage of JsonSchema, somethings I thought are good to have for general public usage. Those things troubled me for a while during I authored a JsonSchema. Versioning Currently there is no standard way how to define a version for a schema. I might use a version property for that. SemVer is good fit for the version content schema. Use if and else for different version.
